parts.text: {"word":"carry","priority":"★★★","meanings":[{"part_of_speech":"verb","transitivity":"vt","definition":"(物を)運ぶ、持つ、携帯する","english_definition":"to support and move (someone or something) from one place to another.","examples":[{"sentence":"He carried the box upstairs.","translation":"彼はその箱を二階に運んだ。"},{"sentence":"She was carrying a baby in her arms.","translation":"彼女は腕に赤ちゃんを抱いていた。"},{"sentence":"You need to carry your passport with you at all times.","translation":"パスポートは常に携帯する必要があります。"}],"collocations":["carry a bag (バッグを運ぶ)","carry a child (子供を抱く)","carry a weapon (武器を携帯する)","carry weight (重要である、影響力がある)","carry out (実行する)"],"synonyms":["transport","convey","bear","move","hold"],"antonyms":["drop","leave","abandon"]},{"part_of_speech":"verb","transitivity":"vt","definition":"(人)を支える、支えることができる","english_definition":"to support the weight of (someone or something).","examples":[{"sentence":"The bridge can carry heavy loads.","translation":"その橋は重い荷物を支えることができる。"},{"sentence":"This pillar carries the weight of the roof.","translation":"この柱は屋根の重さを支えている。"}],"collocations":["carry the weight (重さを支える)","carry the burden (負担を担う)"],"synonyms":["support","sustain","bear","hold up"],"antonyms":["collapse","fail"]},{"part_of_speech":"verb","transitivity":"vt","definition":"(音・匂いなど)を伝える","english_definition":"(of sound, smell, etc.) to travel through the air.","examples":[{"sentence":"The wind carried the sound of music.","translation":"風が音楽の音を運んだ。"},{"sentence":"The scent of flowers carried on the breeze.","translation":"花の香りがそよ風に乗って運ばれてきた。"}],"collocations":["carry a sound (音を伝える)","carry a scent (香りを伝える)","carry a message (メッセージを伝える)"],"synonyms":["transmit","convey","broadcast","relay"],"antonyms":["block","suppress"]},{"part_of_speech":"verb","transitivity":"vt","definition":"(事業・活動など)を行う、実行する","english_definition":"to conduct or perform (something).","examples":[{"sentence":"We need to carry out a thorough investigation.","translation":"徹底的な調査を行う必要がある。"},{"sentence":"The company is carrying out a new marketing campaign.","translation":"会社は新しいマーケティングキャンペーンを実施している。"}],"collocations":["carry out an investigation (調査を行う)","carry out a plan (計画を実行する)","carry out an experiment (実験を行う)","carry out a task (任務を遂行する)","carry on (続ける)"],"synonyms":["conduct","perform","execute","implement","undertake"],"antonyms":["abandon","neglect","halt"]},{"part_of_speech":"verb","transitivity":"vt","definition":"(店などが)(商品)を置いている、扱っている","english_definition":"(of a shop or business) to have (something) for sale.","examples":[{"sentence":"Do you carry this brand of shoes?","translation":"このブランドの靴は置いていますか？"},{"sentence":"The store carries a wide range of products.","translation":"その店は幅広い商品を扱っている。"}],"collocations":["carry a brand (ブランドを扱っている)","carry a product (商品を扱っている)","carry a line of goods (商品を扱っている)"],"synonyms":["stock","sell","offer","provide"],"antonyms":["discontinue","stop selling"]},{"part_of_speech":"verb","transitivity":"vt","definition":"(新聞・テレビなどが)(ニュース)を報道する","english_definition":"(of a newspaper, television station, etc.) to publish or broadcast (news).","examples":[{"sentence":"The story was carried on all the major news channels.","translation":"そのニュースは主要なニュースチャンネルすべてで報道された。"},{"sentence":"The newspaper carried a detailed report of the incident.","translation":"その新聞はその事件の詳細な報道を掲載した。"}],"collocations":["carry a story (記事を報道する)","carry news (ニュースを報道する)","carry a report (報道を掲載する)"],"synonyms":["report","broadcast","publish","cover","air"],"antonyms":["suppress","ignore"]},{"part_of_speech":"verb","transitivity":"vt","definition":"(選挙などで)(票)を獲得する、(議案などが)可決される","english_definition":"(of a candidate or proposal) to win or be approved.","examples":[{"sentence":"The bill was carried by a large majority.","translation":"その法案は圧倒的多数で可決された。"},{"sentence":"Which party do you think will carry the election?","translation":"どの政党が選挙で勝利すると思いますか？"}],"collocations":["carry an election (選挙で勝利する)","carry a vote (投票で可決される)","carry a motion (動議が可決される)","carry a bill (法案が可決される)"],"synonyms":["win","secure","pass","approve"],"antonyms":["lose","fail","reject"]},{"part_of_speech":"verb","transitivity":"vt","definition":"(妊娠)している、(妊娠期間)を過ごす","english_definition":"to be pregnant with (a child).","examples":[{"sentence":"She is carrying twins.","translation":"彼女は双子を妊娠している。"},{"sentence":"She carried the baby to full term.","translation":"彼女は満期まで妊娠期間を過ごした。"}],"collocations":["carry a baby (妊娠している)","carry a child (妊娠している)","carry to term (満期まで妊娠期間を過ごす)"],"synonyms":["be pregnant with","gestate","expect"],"antonyms":[]}],"etymology":{"value":"古フランス語の「carier」（荷車で運ぶ）から派生。さらに遡ると、ラテン語の「carrus」（二輪車）に由来。","priority":"★★☆"},"pronunciation":{"ipa":"/ˈkæri/","syllables":"car-ry"},"inflection":{"verb_forms":{"present_simple":["carry","carries"],"past_simple":"carried","past_participle":"carried","present_participle":"carrying"},"noun_form":"carrying"},"usage_notes":{"explanation":"「**carry**」は基本的な意味として「運ぶ」を表しますが、非常に多くの派生的な意味を持つ多義語です。物理的に物を運ぶだけでなく、音や匂いを伝える、事業や計画を実行する、商品を販売する、ニュースを報道する、選挙で勝利する、妊娠するなど、幅広い意味で使用されます。句動詞（phrasal verbs）も多く、「carry on」（続ける）、「carry out」（実行する）など、重要な表現が含まれます。文脈によって意味が大きく異なるため、注意が必要です。","priority":"★★★"},"common_mistakes":{"examples":[{"incorrect":"✗ I carried him on my back.","correct":"✓ I carried him on my back.","note":"「背中に担ぐ」は "carry on one's back" で正しい表現です。"},{"incorrect":"✗ The wind carried the sound of the sea.","correct":"✓ The wind carried the sound of the sea.","note":"「音を運ぶ」は "carry the sound" で正しい表現です。"},{"incorrect":"✗ He carried out his plan.","correct":"✓ He carried out his plan.","note":"「計画を実行する」は "carry out a plan" で正しい表現です。"}],"priority":"★★☆"},"related_words":{"derivatives":["carrier (名詞: 運搬人、運送業者、保菌者)","carriage (名詞: 馬車、車両)","carrying (名詞: 運搬、携帯)"],"phrasal_verbs":["carry on (続ける、続ける、浮気する)","carry out (実行する)","carry over (繰り越す)","carry through (やり遂げる)","carry off (うまくやり遂げる、誘拐する)"],"priority":"★★★"},"level_frequency":{"CEFR":"A2 (基本的な「運ぶ」の意味)、B1 (より多くの意味、句動詞)","frequency_google_ngram":"非常に高頻度 (Very high frequency) - 英語のコア語彙の一つ。","priority":"★☆☆"},"readability_explanation":{"level":"A2","text":"「**carry**」は、何かをある場所から別の場所に「運ぶ」という意味の基本的な単語です。例えば、「I carry my books to school.（私は本を学校に運びます）」のように使います。また、店が商品を「扱っている」という意味や、音や匂いが「伝わる」という意味もあります。句動詞の「carry on」は「続ける」という意味でよく使われます。"},"example_sentences":[{"sentence":"Can you **carry** this bag for me?","translation":"このバッグを運んでくれますか？","type":"verb (vt)","meaning_category":"運ぶ"},{"sentence":"The bridge can **carry** heavy traffic.","translation":"その橋は重い交通を支えることができる。","type":"verb (vt)","meaning_category":"支える"},{"sentence":"The wind **carried** the smell of the sea.","translation":"風が海の匂いを運んだ。","type":"verb (vt)","meaning_category":"伝える"},{"sentence":"They need to **carry out** the experiment carefully.","translation":"彼らはその実験を慎重に実行する必要がある。","type":"verb (vt)","meaning_category":"実行する"},{"sentence":"The store doesn't **carry** that brand.","translation":"その店はそのブランドを扱っていない。","type":"verb (vt)","meaning_category":"扱っている"},{"sentence":"The news was **carried** on all major networks.","translation":"そのニュースは主要なネットワークすべてで報道された。","type":"verb (vt)","meaning_category":"報道する"},{"sentence":"Which party do you think will **carry** the state?","translation":"どの政党がその州で勝利すると思いますか？","type":"verb (vt)","meaning_category":"(選挙で)勝利する"},{"sentence":"She is **carrying** a baby.","translation":"彼女は妊娠している。","type":"verb (vt)","meaning_category":"妊娠している"}]}
